verbs.description: First Lady Melania Trump [V: has] n’t been seen in public in nearly three weeks , prompting theories about her absence and the hashtag # WheresMelania .
First Lady Melania Trump has n’t [V: been] seen in public in nearly three weeks , prompting theories about her absence and the hashtag # WheresMelania .

[ARG1: First Lady Melania Trump] has [ARGM-NEG: n’t] been [V: seen] [ARGM-LOC: in public] [ARGM-TMP: in nearly three weeks] , [ARGM-ADV: prompting theories about her absence and the hashtag # WheresMelania] .
First Lady Melania Trump has n’t been seen in public in nearly three weeks , [V: prompting] [ARG1: theories about her absence and the hashtag # WheresMelania] .
